mapper.sql:
SELECT V.VisitorHistorySeq ,V.VisitorReservationNumber ,V.VisitorID ,V.VisitorName ,V.VisitorBirth ,V.VisitorMobile ,V.VisitorCompany ,V.VisitorPosition1 ,V.VisitorPosition2 ,V.VisitorPosition3 ,V.VisitApprovalYN ,V.VisitApprovalComment ,V.VisitDate ,V.AgreeFirst ,V.AgreeSecond ,V.CardID ,V.CarNo ,V.HostID ,V.HostName ,V.HostMobile ,V.HostTel ,V.HostDept ,V.HostCompany ,V.HostGradeName ,V.HostPositionName ,V.PlanFromDateTime ,V.PlanToDateTime ,V.Approval ,V.VisitApprovalDateTime ,V.EduCompleteDateTime ,V.CarryStuff ,V.CarryStuffSerialNo ,V.CarryStuffUsed ,V.CarryStuffPurpose ,V.DeleteFlag ,V.VisitPurpose
FROM visitorhistory AS V JOIN visitor AS V1 ON V.VisitorID = V1.VisitorID
WHERE 1=1 AND V.DeleteFlag = 'N'
mapper.select:
SELECT
V.*, vit.vSeq, vit.VisitFromDateTime, vit.VisitToDateTime, vit.CardID FROM visitorhistory AS V
LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM visitinouttime where (VisitToDateTime = '' OR VisitToDateTime IS NULL) OR(CONVERT(varchar(50), VisitFromDateTime, 23) = GETDATE())) AS vit ON V.VisitorHistorySeq = vit.VisitorHistorySeq WHERE 1=1
AND CONVERT(varchar(50), V.PlanFromDateTime, 23) <= CONVERT(varchar(50), #{date}, 23) AND CONVERT(varchar(50), V.PlanToDateTime, 23) >= CONVERT(varchar(50), #{date}, 23)
AND V.VisitorPosition1 = '두산' AND V.DeleteFlag = 'N'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM visitorhistory AS V
LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM visitinouttime where (VisitToDateTime = '' OR VisitToDateTime IS NULL) OR(CONVERT(varchar(50), VisitFromDateTime, 23) = getdate())) AS vit ON V.VisitorHistorySeq = vit.VisitorHistorySeq
WHERE 1=1
AND (CONVERT(varchar(50), V.PlanFromDateTime, 23) <= CONVERT(varchar(50), #{date}, 23) AND CONVERT(varchar(50), V.PlanToDateTime, 23) >= CONVERT(varchar(50), #{date}, 23) OR (CONVERT(varchar(50), V.PlanToDateTime, 23) >= CONVERT(varchar(50), #{date}, 23) AND (vit.VisitToDateTime = '' OR vit.VisitToDateTime IS NULL)))
AND (vit.VisitToDateTime = '' OR vit.VisitToDateTime IS NULL)
AND V.VisitorPosition1 = #{siteCode}
AND V.HostID = #{host.host.hostID}
AND V.DeleteFlag = 'N'
AND V.VisitorHistorySeq = #{pagenation.conditionValue}
AND V.VisitorReservationNumber LIKE ('%' + #{pagenation.conditionValue} + '%')
AND V.VisitorName LIKE ('%' + #{pagenation.conditionValue} + '%')
AND V.VisitorMobile LIKE ('%' + #{pagenation.conditionValue} + '%')
AND V.VisitorCompany LIKE ('%' + #{pagenation.conditionValue} + '%')
AND V.CarNo LIKE ('%' + #{pagenation.conditionValue} + '%')
AND V.HostName LIKE ('%' + #{pagenation.conditionValue} + '%')
AND V.VisitPurpose LIKE ('%' + #{pagenation.conditionValue} + '%')
AND vit.CardID LIKE ('%' + #{pagenation.conditionValue} + '%')

SELECT * FROM visitorhistory AS V
LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM visitinouttime where (VisitToDateTime = '' OR VisitToDateTime IS NULL) OR(CONVERT(varchar(50), VisitFromDateTime, 23) = getdate())) AS vit ON V.VisitorHistorySeq = vit.VisitorHistorySeq
WHERE 1=1
AND CONVERT(varchar(50), V.PlanFromDateTime, 23) <= CONVERT(varchar(50), #{date}, 23) AND CONVERT(varchar(50), V.PlanToDateTime, 23) >= CONVERT(varchar(50), #{date}, 23)
AND V.DeleteFlag = 'N'

SELECT count(*) FROM VisitorHistory WHERE visitApprovalYN = 'N' AND REJECTFLAG IS NULL
and convert(varchar(50), PlanFromDateTime, 23) >= convert(varchar(50), convert(datetime, #{searchFromDateTime}), 23) and convert(varchar(50), PlanToDateTime, 23) <= convert(varchar(50), convert(datetime, #{searchToDateTime}), 23)
AND VisitorName LIKE ('%' + #{pagenation.conditionValue} + '%')
AND VisitorMobile LIKE ('%' + #{pagenation.conditionValue} + '%')
AND VisitorCompany LIKE ('%' + #{pagenation.conditionValue} + '%')

SELECT VisitorHistorySeq ,VisitorReservationNumber ,VisitorType ,VisitorID ,VisitorName ,VisitorBirth ,VisitorMobile ,VisitorDept ,VisitorCompany ,VisitorPosition1 ,VisitorPosition2 ,VisitorPosition3 ,VisitApprovalYN ,VisitApprovalComment ,VisitDate ,AgreeFirst ,AgreeSecond ,CardID ,CarNo ,HostID ,HostName ,HostMobile ,HostTel ,HostDept ,HostCompany ,HostGradeName ,HostPositionName ,PlanFromDateTime ,PlanToDateTime ,Approval ,VisitApprovalDateTime ,EduCompleteDateTime ,CarryStuff ,CarryStuffSerialNo ,CarryStuffUsed ,CarryStuffPurpose ,DeleteFlag ,VisitPurpose ,VisitPurposeDetail ,RejectFlag ,RejectComment ,RejectType FROM VisitorHistory WHERE visitApprovalYN = 'N' AND REJECTFLAG IS NULL
and convert(varchar(50), PlanFromDateTime, 23) >= convert(varchar(50), convert(datetime, #{searchFromDateTime}), 23) and convert(varchar(50), PlanToDateTime, 23) <= convert(varchar(50), convert(datetime, #{searchToDateTime}), 23)
AND VisitorName LIKE ('%' + #{pagenation.conditionValue} + '%')
AND VisitorMobile LIKE ('%' + #{pagenation.conditionValue} + '%')
AND VisitorCompany LIKE ('%' + #{pagenation.conditionValue} + '%')
ORDER BY VisitApprovalYN DESC, EduCompleteDateTime DESC, VisitorHistorySeq DESC offset #{pagenation.startPage} rows fetch next #{pagenation.size} rows only

SELECT
vseq, V.visitorhistoryseq, visitfromdatetime, visittodatetime, visitorreservationnumber, visitorid, visitorname, visitorbirth, visitormobile, visitorcompany, visitorposition1, visitorposition2, visitorposition3, visitapprovalyn, visitapprovalcomment , visitdate, agreefirst, agreesecond, vit.cardid, carno, hostid, hostname, hostmobile, hosttel, hostdept, hostcompany, hostgradename, hostpositionname , CONVERT(varchar(10), planfromdatetime, 23) AS planfromdatetime, CONVERT(varchar(10), plantodatetime, 23) AS plantodatetime, approval, visitapprovaldatetime, educompletedatetime, carrystuff, carrystuffserialno, carrystuffused, carrystuffpurpose, deleteflag, visitpurpose , rejectFlag, rejectComment, rejectType , (CASE WHEN (CONVERT(varchar(10), V.PlanFromDateTime, 23) <= CONVERT(varchar(10), GETDATE(), 23) AND CONVERT(varchar(10), V.PlanToDateTime, 23) >= CONVERT(varchar(10), GETDATE(), 23)) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS ToDayYN FROM visitorhistory AS V
LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM visitinouttime where (VisitToDateTime = '' OR VisitToDateTime IS NULL) OR(CONVERT(varchar(10), VisitFromDateTime, 23) = GETDATE())) AS vit ON V.VisitorHistorySeq = vit.VisitorHistorySeq
WHERE 1=1
AND (CONVERT(varchar(50), V.PlanFromDateTime, 23) <= CONVERT(varchar(50), CONVERT(DATETIME, #{date}), 23) AND CONVERT(varchar(50), V.PlanToDateTime, 23) >= CONVERT(varchar(50), CONVERT(DATETIME, #{date}), 23) OR (CONVERT(varchar(50), V.PlanToDateTime, 23) >= CONVERT(varchar(50), CONVERT(DATETIME, #{date}), 23) AND (vit.VisitToDateTime = '' OR vit.VisitToDateTime IS NULL)))
AND (vit.VisitToDateTime = '' OR vit.VisitToDateTime IS NULL)
AND V.HostID = #{host.host.hostID}
AND V.DeleteFlag = 'N'
AND V.VisitorHistorySeq = #{pagenation.conditionValue}
AND V.VisitorReservationNumber LIKE ('%' + #{pagenation.conditionValue} + '%')
AND V.VisitorName LIKE ('%' + #{pagenation.conditionValue} + '%')
AND V.VisitorMobile LIKE ('%' + #{pagenation.conditionValue} + '%')
AND V.VisitorCompany LIKE ('%' + #{pagenation.conditionValue} + '%')
AND V.CarNo LIKE ('%' + #{pagenation.conditionValue} + '%')
AND V.HostName LIKE ('%' + #{pagenation.conditionValue} + '%')
AND V.VisitPurpose LIKE ('%' + #{pagenation.conditionValue} + '%')
AND vit.CardID LIKE ('%' + #{pagenation.conditionValue} + '%')
ORDER BY
V.VisitApprovalYN DESC, V.EduCompleteDateTime DESC, V.VisitorHistorySeq DESC
V.VisitApprovalYN DESC, V.EduCompleteDateTime DESC, V.VisitorHistorySeq DESC
V.VisitApprovalYN ASC, V.EduCompleteDateTime DESC, V.VisitorHistorySeq DESC
offset #{pagenation.startPage} rows fetch next #{pagenation.size} rows only
mapper.update:
UPDATE
V SET V.CardID = #{cardID} FROM VisitorHistory AS V WHERE V.VisitorHistorySeq = #{visitorHistorySeq}
mapper.select:
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM visitorhistory AS V WHERE VisitorID = #{visitorID} AND
EduCompleteDateTime > (SELECT DATEADD(MONTH, -6, GETDATE()))
